entry.title: Next steps.
entry.summary:
Good news everyone, HSTS, PFS, and strong ciphers are now configured!The encryption is mainly for logging in to the blog a few other things. I kind of want to install EtherPad... that will be a different day, maybe when I bump the Virtual Machine specs or move to bare metal.

On a sadder note just yesterday morning the world lost another great man. He started the business I work for and has made it a great place to work. His passing away reminds me of a very good friend of mine who recently passed away along with my grandfather. We will never forget what the have done in the time they have been with us. From the smiles to the heartfelt caring we will always remember.
